meanings.definition: To produce an excessive amount of suds.
meanings.sent1: When I added too much soap, the washing machine oversudsed and made a mess.
meanings.sent2: The dishwasher oversudsed because I accidentally used the wrong detergent.
meanings.sent3: The soap oversudsed so much that it looked like a fluffy cloud in the sink.
meanings.sent4: The bubbles from the bubble bath oversudsed like a playful foam party in the tub.
meanings.sent5: The laundry detergent oversudsed, creating a soapy waterfall of bubbles.

meanings.sent1: After adding too much soap, the sink was filled with oversuds.
meanings.sent2: The oversuds from the washing machine spilled onto the floor.
meanings.sent3: The oversuds in the bathtub made it impossible to see the toy duck floating in them.
meanings.sent4: The oversuds in the bubble bath resembled a fluffy white blanket covering the water.
meanings.sent5: The oversuds in the dishwasher overflowed like a soapy volcano erupting.
